item.title: 费米国家加速器实验室遭遇针对微软 SharePoint 的网络攻击
item.description: 费米国家加速器实验室是美国能源部的 17 个国家实验室之一，在最近一次试图利用微软公司 SharePoint 软件缺陷的行动中遭到黑客攻击。【原文：The Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory, one of the Department of Energy’s 17 national labs, was attacked by hackers as part of a recent campaign seeking to exploit flaws in Microsoft Corp.’s SharePoint software.】

item.title: 美联储会议前亚洲股市开盘低迷市场综述
item.description: 在美联储做出政策决定之前，亚洲股市将迎来一个低迷的开局，投资者对中美贸易谈判取得进展也不抱什么希望。【原文：Asian equities are set for a lackluster start ahead of the Federal Reserve’s policy decision, with investors showing little enthusiasm for progress in US-China trade talks.】

item.title: 通胀风险减弱，智利央行将利率降至 4.75
item.description: 智利央行今年首次下调基准利率，原因是就业市场疲软，经济活动受到抑制，总体通胀放缓幅度超过预期。【原文：Chile’s central bank cut its benchmark interest rate for the first time this year as a weak jobs market crimps activity and headline inflation slows more than expected.】

item.title: SoFi 股票发行 15 亿美元后股价暴跌
item.description: SoFi Technologies Inc. 周二尾盘下跌，大部分抹去了早些时候的涨幅，此前这家消费金融服务提供商表示将出售 15 亿美元的股票。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. dropped in late trading Tuesday, mostly wiping out earlier gains, after the provider of consumer financial services said it’s selling $1.5 billion of stock.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁巴西牛肉，销售额损失 10 亿美元
item.description: 据代表包括 JBS NV 在内的公司的行业组织 Abiec 称，如果美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五推进对巴西出口牛肉征收 50%关税的计划，巴西牛肉出口商在 2025 年下半年的销售额将面临 10 亿美元的损失。【原文：Brazilian beef exporters could face a $1 billion hit to sales in the second half of 2025 if US President Donald Trump moves forward Friday with a plan to impose 50% tariffs on the country’s exports, according to industry group Abiec, which represents companies including JBS NV.】

item.title: 日本央行将维持利率不变，并可能上调物价观点
item.description: 预计日本央行周四将维持基准利率稳定，并上调通胀前景，因为在美日贸易协议减少了一些不确定性之后，投资者正在寻找今年再次加息的暗示。【原文：The Bank of Japan is expected to keep its benchmark interest rate steady and boost its inflation outlook Thursday, as investors look for hints of another rate hike this year after a US-Japan trade deal reduced some uncertainty.】

item.title: 约翰-赫斯收购雪佛龙后将向其购买标志性玩具卡车
item.description: 石油巨头雪佛龙公司本月收购了约翰-赫斯的公司，约翰-赫斯计划明年从雪佛龙公司手中买回家族的标志性玩具卡车业务。【原文：John Hess plans to buy back his family’s iconic toy truck business next year from Chevron Corp. after the oil giant bought his company this month.】

item.title: Arm 支持的芯片制造商 Ambiq 首次公开募股融资 9600 万美元
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，人工智能应用超低功耗半导体制造商 Ambiq Micro Inc.【原文：Ambiq Micro Inc., a maker of ultra-low power semiconductors for artificial intelligence applications, raised $96 million in an upsized initial public offering, pricing its shares near the top of a marketed range, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国债交易员在美联储会议前削减债券看涨押注
item.description: 过去一周，债券交易员减少了对国债的押注，因为市场正在为美联储会议做准备，预计这次会议将揭示央行在未来几个月内降息的力度。【原文：Bond traders cut bets on Treasuries over the past week, as markets brace for a Federal Reserve meeting that is expected to shed light on how aggressively the central bank will lower interest rates in coming months.】

item.title: 美国最大公共养老金公司首席执行官称对私募股权投资 "非常有信心
item.description: 据美国最大的公共养老金计划首席执行官玛西-弗罗斯特（Marcie Frost）称，该计划致力于私募股权投资，即使在交易长期低迷的情况下，该资产类别仍在努力向投资者返还现金。【原文：The largest public pension plan in the US is committed to private equity, according to its chief executive officer, Marcie Frost, even as the asset class has struggled to return cash to its investors amid a prolonged deal slump.】

item.title: 跨境消费增加，Visa 盈利超出预期
item.description: 全球最大的支付网络维萨公司（Visa Inc.【原文：Visa Inc. reported a fiscal third-quarter profit that topped Wall Street estimates as the world’s biggest payments network reported double-digit gains in cross-border purchases and processed transactions.】

item.title: 中国股市在发出 "抽水与倾销 "警告后几分钟内下跌 90
item.description: 周二，一家在纳斯达克上市的中国医疗保健公司 Pheton Holdings Ltd.，在熊洞研究报告称其可能成为抽水式抛售计划的目标之后数小时内，市值在短短几分钟内损失了 90%。【原文：Pheton Holdings Ltd., a Nasdaq-listed Chinese health care company, lost 90% of its market value in a matter of minutes on Tuesday, hours after a Bear Cave research report said it may be the target of a pump-and-dump scheme.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所所有者 ICE 正在洽谈 60 亿美元的 Enverus 交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，纽约证券交易所的母公司洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc.【原文：Intercontinental Exchange Inc., parent of the New York Stock Exchange, is in talks to acquire Enverus in a deal that would value the energy data platform at at least $6 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 以不确定性为由，Booking Holdings 预测不乐观
item.description: Booking Holdings Inc. 发布了令人失望的第三季度业绩预测，理由是 "地缘政治和宏观经济环境的不确定性增加"。【原文：Booking Holdings Inc. delivered a disappointing forecast for the third quarter, citing “increased uncertainty in the geopolitical and macroeconomic environment.”】

item.title: YouTube 计划使用人工智能检测美国观众是否未满 18 岁
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的 YouTube 很快将开始使用人工智能来判断美国的观众是否未满 18 周岁，这是因为最大的科技公司面临着越来越大的压力，要求它们加强儿童的网络安全。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s YouTube will soon begin using artificial intelligence to determine whether viewers in the US are under the age of 18, following increased pressure on the biggest tech companies to strengthen online safety for children.】

item.title: 医疗技术首次公开募股引发美国医疗保健行业上市复兴的讨论
item.description: 在经历了艰难的一年之后，医疗技术公司正在帮助重振美国生命科学领域的首次公开募股，在这一年中，监管的不确定性阻碍了此类活动。【原文：Medical-technology companies are helping revive initial public offerings in the life-sciences sector in the US after a tough year so far, during which regulatory uncertainty has hampered such activity.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片初创公司 Groq 接近 6 亿美元融资交易
item.description: 据熟悉谈判情况的人士透露，人工智能芯片初创公司 Groq Inc. 将在新一轮融资中筹集约 6 亿美元，使该公司的估值达到约 60 亿美元。【原文：Artificial intelligence chip startup Groq Inc. is set to raise about $600 million in a new funding round that gives the company a roughly $6 billion valuation, according to people familiar with the talks.】

item.title: 通利的加密货币交易所上市一个月后开始回购
item.description: 不到一个月前，在Fundstrat Global Advisors公司的汤姆-李（Tom Lee）带头将比特币矿机转变为一家加密金库公司之后，凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的方舟投资管理公司（Ark Investment Management）等投资者纷纷抢购BitMine Immersion Technologies Inc.的股票。【原文：Less than a month ago, investors such as Cathie Wood’s Ark Investment Management were snapping up the shares of BitMine Immersion Technologies Inc. after Tom Lee of Fundstrat Global Advisors spearheaded the transformation of the Bitcoin miner into a crypto treasury company.】

item.title: 彼得罗就卢比奥对哥伦比亚司法机构的批评斥责美国
item.description: 在国务卿马尔科-鲁比奥（Marco Rubio）批评前领导人阿尔瓦罗-乌里韦（Alvaro Uribe）被定罪后，哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）告诉美国驻哥伦比亚大使馆 "不要干涉 "哥伦比亚的司法系统。【原文：President Gustavo Petro told the US embassy in Colombia “not to interfere” in his country’s justice system after Secretary of State Marco Rubio criticized the conviction of former leader Alvaro Uribe.】

item.title: 贸易阴云未散，加拿大央行仍将维持利率不变
item.description: 加拿大央行几乎肯定会在周三保持利率稳定，因为官员们要权衡通胀压力和美国关税对经济造成的损害。【原文：The Bank of Canada is nearly certain to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday as officials weigh inflation pressures against the economic damage created by US tariffs.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，Palo Alto 考虑以超过 200 亿美元的价格收购 CyberArk
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Palo Alto Networks 公司正在洽谈收购 CyberArk 软件有限公司，这笔交易对这家以色列网络安全公司的估值可能超过 200 亿美元。【原文：Palo Alto Networks Inc. is in talks to buy CyberArk Software Ltd. in a deal that could value the Israeli cybersecurity firm at more than $20 billion, according to the Wall Street Journal.】

item.title: 英伟达亿万富豪排名扩大，包括首席财务官和销售主管
item.description: 由于芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的持续增长，又有两位高管获得了十位数的财富，使该公司的亿万富翁总数达到了六位数。【原文：Two more Nvidia Corp. executives have gained 10-figure fortunes as a result of the chipmaker’s relentless growth, bringing the total number of billionaires at the company to half a dozen.】

item.title: 芝加哥市长提出恢复对公司征税以筹集资金
item.description: 芝加哥市长布兰登-约翰逊（Brandon Johnson）正在考虑恢复对企业征税，以帮助增加收入和平衡城市预算。【原文：Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is considering reviving a tax on corporations to help raise revenue and balance the city’s budget.】

item.title: CFPB 告诉法官计划重新修订消费者数据权利规则
item.description: 在摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The US Consumer Financial Protection Bureau is having second thoughts about asking a federal judge to eliminate a Biden-era open-banking rule after proposed data access fees from JPMorgan Chase & Co. drew the ire of several Trump administration allies, including one of the president’s sons.】

item.title: 前千年交易员巴克利推出以能源为重点的对冲基金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，千禧管理有限责任公司（Millennium Management LLC）的一位前高级投资组合经理在纽荷兰资本（New Holland Capital）的支持下成立了一家以能源为重点的对冲基金。【原文：A former Millennium Management LLC senior portfolio manager has launched an energy-focused hedge fund with the backing of New Holland Capital, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国环保局公布废除美国温室气体管制权的计划
item.description: 特朗普政府正式提议取消美国政府将温室气体作为空气污染物进行监管的权力，此举将严重削弱华盛顿应对气候变化的能力。【原文：The Trump administration is formally proposing to scrap the US government’s authority to regulate greenhouse gases as an air pollutant, a move that sets the stage to severely weaken Washington’s ability to fight climate change.】

item.title: EToro 将在以太坊网络上代币化美国股票，进行全天候交易
item.description: eToro Group Ltd. 计划推出美国上市股票的代币化版本，使客户能够在一天中的任何时间进行股票交易。虽然该公司拒绝说明何时开始发售，但表示很可能会在欧洲开始发售。【原文：eToro Group Ltd. plans to launch tokenized versions of US-listed stocks, enabling customers to trade equities at any time of day. Though the company declined to specify when the offering would begin, it said it would likely start in Europe.】

item.title: AllianceBernstein 将把债券和小额互惠基金转换为新的 ETF
item.description: AllianceBernstein LP 计划将其三只固定收益共同基金转换为交易所交易基金，这表明成本较低的投资产品越来越受欢迎。【原文：AllianceBernstein LP plans to convert three of its fixed-income mutual funds into exchange-traded funds, underscoring the growing popularity of the lower-cost investment product.】

item.title: 苹果在一个月内失去第四位人工智能研究员，转投 Meta 的超级智能团队
item.description: 苹果公司在一个月内失去了第四位人工智能研究员，Meta Platforms Inc.【原文：Apple Inc. has lost its fourth AI researcher in a month to Meta Platforms Inc., marking the latest setback to the iPhone maker’s artificial intelligence efforts.】

item.title: 花旗集团聘请摩根大通资深人士 Pankaj Goel 共同领导技术部门
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）在旧金山聘请了摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Citigroup Inc. has hired longtime JPMorgan Chase & Co. technology investment banker Pankaj Goel in San Francisco.】
